value.desc: If value is 0, '0' or 'false' then directive is disabled; else it is enabled)

arg.desc: y:x:z, where y is the step for vertical movement, x is the step for horizontal movement and z is a class name to be applied on the grouping element when it's active (default q-key-group-navigation--active)

horizontal.desc: Navigate using HOME, ARROW_LEFT, ARROW_RIGHT or END keys

vertical.desc: Navigate using PG_UP, ARROW_UP, ARROW_DOWN or PG_DOWN keys

all.desc: Default - Navigate using HOME / PG_UP, ARROW_LEFT / ARROW_UP, ARROW_RIGHT / ARROW_DOWN or END / PG_DOWN keys
